[youtub e]http://www.youtube.com/ watch?v=AbJ6BkQ7CAo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

Its like 4 years old lol… I was trying to break the cup[/quote]I wish we could be together for ever my dear, you are what motivates me to live on through the hard struggles of my life. Newty, I propose to you whole-heartedly, will you marry me my love? Your attractiveness and bulkiness has mesmerized me and I don’t think I can go another day without being physically bound to your being (yes I do anal).

item.title: Videos of you
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:540135”][quote author=ravekitty link=topic=658986.msg4407525#msg4407525 date=1392481336]
Ever made a video of yourself?

Share the link here.

Here’s one of me http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-JlN0HcS2SI
[/quote]

Just a few tips

  1. don’t sway your armsback and forth like you do constantly not a good habit during speeches
  2. don’[t put your mouth so close to the microphone if you notice your voice sounds like you are spitting some words and it distorts the quality of the microphone
  3. think about what gestures and facial expressions you perform before you go up to the stage[/quote][quote=“nolan2131, post:5, topic:540135”]Also were you reading off of something to the side of the camera at one point or another?[/quote]

Yes, I recorded this video twice. I tried to memorize my script in the first video, but that didn’t work out too well.

So I ended up reading it from my computer.

And thank you, Love. I’ll try to improve on that

Read full topic

item.title: Videos of you
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:1, topic:540135”]Ever made a video of yourself?

Share the link here.

Here’s one of me http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-JlN0HcS2SI [/quote]

Just a few tips

  1. don’t sway your armsback and forth like you do constantly not a good habit during speeches
  2. don’[t put your mouth so close to the microphone if you notice your voice sounds like you are spitting some words and it distorts the quality of the microphone
  3. think about what gestures and facial expressions you perform before you go up to the stage

Read full topic
